titleStmt.title: The priuate schoole of defence. Or The defects of publique teachers, exactly discouered, by way of obiection and resolution Together vvith the true practise of the science, set downe in iudicious rules and obseruances; in a method neuer before expressed. By G.H. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Hale, George, fl. 1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Snodham] for Iohn Helme, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet
